description: The iconic S-Biner design allows quick and easy attachment using its unique double-gated design. This S-Biner features a SlideLock mechanism that allows each gate to be locked independently to keep all your items confidently secured. The lightweight and colorful aluminum body with stainless steel gates is available in a variety of sizes creating a perfect way to hold, secure, and connect everything from keys to water bottles to gear.
name: S-Biner SlideLock Combo - Aluminum - 3 Pack
